item.name: Login with user with no access

exec: pm.test("Login successful. The account displayed in response matches with credentials and has not admin rights.", function () {
pm.test("The user does not have the correct rights to create service template.", function () {
pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.eql("You are not allowed to add a service template");
pm.test("The user does not have the correct rights to delete service template.", function () {
pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.eql("You are not allowed to delete a service template");
pm.test("The user does not have the correct rights to update service template.", function () {
pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.eql("You are not allowed to update a service template");
pm.test("The service templates have not been  listed, because the user does have the corrects rights", function () {
pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.eql("You are not allowed to access service templates");
